title: 极限模式大家最多活了几天？
author: stevem

replies.author: MINE蓝妖
replies.txt_content: 从来活不过2天

replies.author: 凛
replies.txt_content: 没数

replies.author: 飘然是茫然
replies.txt_content:
两秒。
因为出生在海底城堡，逃不出去。闷死了
